subject: Implementation of Standard Operating Procedure for Management of Fee Plaza under Public Funded and BOT (Annuity)
text: HTri 774ft4 <THT gfadrvt 3TM /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 (a3m #Raa7 3 7Tan #NTT4) 447 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 7#9 91 National Highways Authority of India R. IExtn:: 2223 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i-5 &a 6, #q<-10, ETIQ; # @irit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/3/05-06/C0 /PolicyonToll (Vol.XII SOP TP 31.03.2011 CIRCULAR NO: NHAILCQMMERCIALQPERATIONS 129 Sub:: Implementation of Standard Operating Procedure for Management of Fee Plazas under Public Funded and BOT (Annuity): To have uniformity in the management and maintenance of records at the fee plazas and to define the  responsibility and duties of the employees engaged at the plaza, NHAI had engaged a consultant for preparation of Standard Operating Procedure for management of Fee plazas: The SOP prepared by the consultant has already been implemented at one of the fee plaza  successfully for a period of 3 months on experimental basis. The soft copy of the SOP is enclosed herewith for immediate implementation of the same. circular issued in   supersession of a circular mentioned in the SOP and all future circulars shall  have the overriding effect over the SOP. Project Directors are expected to implement this SOP within one month from the date of receipt of this circular. The SOP is applicable on the Fee Plazas where fee collection is going on either through DGR agency or through PDs by hiring man power through a security agency. |l 3 0 3120/1 Abdul Ali) GM (CO) To All RO/ PIU's/CMU's Copy to: All CGMs All GMs, Librarian Z:IGM(COJIDGM(CO) Policy on tollISOP TPINotesdoc NHAL Any
